mapper.insert: insert into qt_financial_borrow_money (id, productId, couponId, userId, amount, daynum, status, repaymentDate, repaymentAmount, arriveAmount, auditCost, factorageCost, rate, manageCost, reductionExemption, applyAt, createdAt) values (#{id}, #{productId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{couponId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{daynum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{repaymentDate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{repaymentAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{arriveAmount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{auditCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{factorageCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{rate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{manageCost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{reductionExemption,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, #{applyAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createdAt,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})
mapper.update: update qt_financial_borrow_money set productId = #{productid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, couponId = #{couponid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, userId = #{userid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, amount = #{amount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, daynum = #{daynum,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, repaymentDate = #{repaymentdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, repaymentAmount = #{repaymentamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, arriveAmount = #{arriveamount,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, auditCost = #{auditcost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, factorageCost = #{factoragecost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, rate = #{rate,jdbcType=INTEGER}, manageCost = #{managecost,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, reductionExemption = #{reductionexemption,jdbcType=DECIMAL}, applyAt = #{applyat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, createdAt = #{createdat,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, productId, couponId, userId, amount, daynum, status, repaymentDate, repaymentAmount, arriveAmount, auditCost, factorageCost, rate, manageCost, reductionExemption, applyAt, createdAt from qt_financial_borrow_money where id = #{id}
